cli.dry_run_mode: Dry-run mode: creating temporary config and validating it
cli.temp_file_deleted: Temporary file deleted. Main config not changed, service not restarted.
cli.dry_run.help: Validate config and print result (no changes).
cli.run.help: Generate and apply sing-box config (default scenario).
cli.list_servers.help: List all available servers from config.
cli.lang.help: Manage CLI language (i18n): show current, list available, set and persist language.
cli.lang.bilingual_notice: Bilingual mode (en + system) is used only when language is not explicitly set. When you set a language explicitly, only that language will be shown.
cli.lang.set.help: Set CLI language code (e.g., en, ru).
